languages.text: This ring grants the wearer a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}. It also increases {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +1.

languages.text: このリングは使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}に+5の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を付与する。さらに{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}を+1増加させる。

languages.text: Este anillo proporciona al portador una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de +5 a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g}. También aumenta la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Firmeza{/g} en +1.

languages.text: Dieser Ring gewährt dem Träger einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +5 auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g}. Er erhöht außerdem die {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g} um +1.

languages.text: Cet anneau confère à son utilisateur un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g} de +5. Il accroît également sa {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} de +1.

languages.text: Bu yüzük, takan kişinin {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sosyallik{/g} niteliğine +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} kazandırır. Ayrıca {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}kararlılık{/g} değerini +1 artırır.
